snippet: President Obama’s remarks on race and the verdict in the Trayvon Martin case prompted a swift online reaction, with many people thanking him for sharing his personal experience as a black man.
abstract: President Obama’s remarks on race and the verdict in the Trayvon Martin case prompted a swift online reaction, with many people thanking him for sharing his personal experience as a black man.

headline.main: Obama's Remarks on Race Prompt Emotional Outpouring on Twitter
